name: battvoltBDSel
label: value to check
description: select a value to monitor for value change

name: ADconvertor
label: voltage transducer name
description: set the name for the xdr transducer for the voltage, leave empty to disable

name: bvInstanceId
label: voltage instance id
description: the N2K instance id for the voltage

name: battvoltintv
label: battvolt Interval
description: Interval(s) to query AD conversion battvolt (1...300sec)

name: numReadings
label: number AD readings to be averaged
description: number AD readings to be averaged (1...10000)

name: voltCorr
label: Correction for n2k power line resistance
description: correction for volt deviation due to resistance in power line in mV(1...10000)
